meanings.definition: A type of correctional institution for young offenders.
meanings.sent1: The borstals aim to rehabilitate young offenders.
meanings.sent2: He was sent to one of the borstals for his crime.
meanings.sent3: The young boy found himself in a borstal after stealing a candy bar.
meanings.sent4: The borstals stood as a symbol of hope for troubled youth.
meanings.sent5: The walls of the borstals echoed with the laughter of the reformed teenagers.

meanings.definition: The system of such institutions collectively.
meanings.sent1: The government invested in improving the borstals across the country.
meanings.sent2: The borstals played a crucial role in the juvenile justice system.
meanings.sent3: In the world of borstals, rules and regulations are strictly enforced.
meanings.sent4: The network of borstals formed a safety net for troubled youth.
meanings.sent5: The concept of borstals revolutionized the approach to youth rehabilitation.
